value.name: Michael Giles Murder: Where is Kwaneta Harris Now?
value.description: For more than a year after Michael Giles was last seen, his family believed that he was still alive and had been away from home traveling. But that belief was shattered when his body was found in his own backyard in October 2007.

value.name: Gun Availability Worsens Domestic Abuse, But Gun Bans Don’t Create Safety Either
value.description: By federal law, anyone convicted of domestic abuse or who has an order of protection against them must surrender their guns. Enforcement, however, is left up to individual states. In Tennessee, a person convicted of abuse can simply sign an affidavit stating that they’re giving their guns to a friend or relative.

value.name: James "Jim" Carlton Giles
value.description: Those left to cherish his memories include his wife of over forty years, Carol Giles; children Michael Giles and wife Renee, Tracy Conway and husband Kenneth, Michelle Giles, and Courtney Joyce.

value.name: What poultry federation president says about labor shortages
value.description: May 21—Georgia Poultry Federation President Mike Giles said the poultry industry has not been immune to the labor shortages that have plagued other state businesses.
